Hi. I'm trying to find information about the Sasaki clan, that was 
based in Southern Omi, until the Oda restored Yoshiaki to Kyoto in 
1568. Searching on various search engines including Google has 
proven futile, and the little I have gleaned of this clan I have 
found in Eiji Yoshikawa's excellent Taiko. Could anyone point me in 
the right direction please?

Thanks,
JP
